Updates on HS Optimus.- The Single Seller SSH Wong (CEO - Gloria Wong - father) sold 355 mil shares at $0.004 since he began selling openly on market in Dec 20 til 2nd June 21. Approx 6.5 months period.- His last reported holdings were 267 mil shares (4.98%) before he went under the Radar.Since he went under the radar there have been approx 136mil shares traded mostly at $0.004 after 2nd June.For those  who have watched HS Optimus long enough  we know that most of the selling is done by Wong.Let‚Äôs discount the  136 mil that 70% is Wong‚Äôs selling  this equates to additional 95 mil shares he sold after he went under the radar.Hence  he should still be holding 267 mil - 95 mil =171 mill shares as of today . +/- 10%Summary: He sold Approximately 450 mil shares in the past 8.5 months.
